author: dims
msg: Fix for AXIS-1271 - Type mappings in wsdd are replicated each time a service is deployed

author: dims
msg: Fix for AXIS-1281 - Process SOAPFault Detail when context is not set

author: tomj
msg: Set the charset in the Content-type to match the charset that we claim
we are using in the <xml> tag of generated WSDL.
This makes the output writer do the correct Unicode to charset (generally utf8)
conversion when we write strings to it.
Fixes a problem with i18n characters in things like namespaces and the like.

author: ias
msg: Tender revision for multiple build problem.
Be careful of not copying other files than samples/ws-i/scm/source/java/implemented to build/work/ws-i/scm.

author: ias
msg: Fix for duplicate class error from rebuilding ws-i scm.
